paragraphs.body: Administrators are experienced and trusted members of the Avatar Wiki community who have access to restricted technical features ("tools") which help with maintenance. They are also useful as moderators in community discussion and interaction.
paragraphs.text: Administrators are experienced and trusted members of the Avatar Wiki community who have access to restricted technical features ("tools") which help with maintenance. They are also useful as moderators in community discussion and interaction.

paragraphs.body: Those seeking help can turn to an administrator for advice and information. However, administrators are not a smaller, "more powerful" subset of users, and content and policy decisions are the responsibility of the entire community.
paragraphs.text: Those seeking help can turn to an administrator for advice and information. However, administrators are not a smaller, "more powerful" subset of users, and content and policy decisions are the responsibility of the entire community.

paragraphs.body: As part of adminship, administrators are expected to use their abilities where it is considered necessary. Administrators should also watch the ${link_0} whenever they can.
paragraphs.text: As part of adminship, administrators are expected to use their abilities where it is considered necessary. Administrators should also watch the administrator noticeboard whenever they can.

paragraphs.body: Administrators have been entrusted with the means to maintain the overall quality of the site. With this in mind:
paragraphs.text: Administrators have been entrusted with the means to maintain the overall quality of the site. With this in mind:

paragraphs.body: Administrators should remain active to assist the wiki, having been entrusted with additional user rights by its community.
paragraphs.text: Administrators should remain active to assist the wiki, having been entrusted with additional user rights by its community.

paragraphs.body: Although there are currently six administrators, the number will be limited to five via natural attrition. However, when a position is open, ${link_0} who have distinguished themselves over a period of time may be nominated for administratorship.
paragraphs.text: Although there are currently six administrators, the number will be limited to five via natural attrition. However, when a position is open, rollback users who have distinguished themselves over a period of time may be nominated for administratorship.
